ComicInfo.Summary:
Faced with the terrible consequences of a war they cannot remember, the Power Rangers are left to pick up the pieces of Shattered Grid, but the effect on the Morphing Grid may be more than they can handle. When put to the test, what will they choose-the world, or their team?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Main Cover | Amelia Vidal | 1 | B | Preorder Variant Cover | Miguel Mercado (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 2 | Var | 1:20 Album Variant Cover | Gleb Melnikov (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 3 | Var | Social Variant Cover | Johanna the Mad (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 4 | *Notes:* The 1:20 Album Variant Cover is a homage of the album cover Nsync' for 'N Sync.
